overview: Donna has always had a passion for art and music and she combined the two perfectly when she began her career as a graphic designer for a well known Record Company. She spent ten years working on album designs for the likes of Britney Spears, The Backstreet Boys, R Kelly and many more. ﻿ In 2001, she branched out on her own, working with a wide range of clients in the entertainment industry such as EMI, Universal Records, Sony Playstation, Warners, Lionsgate and Revolver Films, to name a few. ​ Donna has a great eye for detail and works with astounding speed and precision. Her wide range of skills include CD/DVD design, film poster design and advertising, web and social media development and application user interface design. She thrives on providing creative solutions with a happy, friendly, straight-talking approach.
